snippet.title: Adventurezator - Intro Teaser
snippet.description:
This is the intro teaser for the Adventurezator: When Pigs Fly. It was entirely created using the Cutscene Creator from the Adventurezator!

On Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/300280

Website: http://www.adventurezator.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PigasusGames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pigasusgames
